body: It's kind of pathetic how predictable every NTR story is. I'm not asking for a novel but holy shit can these people have some originality? If you want to make something this obvious just hurry up with it instead of having two useless build up chapters.

So from all i know. Sister's Duty novel(already ended) is different from manhwa because of adding crush/gf character here, but i think it willprobably have same hardcore ending as novel, but including crush/gf into it... (author taste...) through rape, "training" by Douche and some "drugs" they both will broke, turning into sex and drug addict bitches like sister in novel, leaving mc suffer.(NTR hentai route lol) I readed it for story too, but i sensed this from all that chapters...(not expecting so hardcore) Now i'll only follow this for hot sex scenes that we sure get in future, how author will lead the story in manhwa and does he pick same ending, but with crush/gf too. I wonder how many chapters it will have when novel is 22 only.

Have in mind manhwa is different and have additional character crush/gf and can have another route, but not better so be prepeared for worst and so don't go deep into story and characters. Just enjoy hot scenes.
